title: Thief of Women 1962 (Colorized Comedy) directed by Willy Rozier

sources.title: Thief of Women 1962 (Colorized Comedy) directed by Willy Rozier
sources.description:
Adventure, laughter, and a heist gone hilariously wrong in the heart of the Alps!
A young botanist, an Englishwoman and her daughter are prisoners of a group of bandits operating in the mountains of Albania. A ransom is demanded. The capture of the gang leaderâ€™s daughter, however, brings the situation to a happy conclusion.

Original title: Le Roi des montagnes (1962)  AKA:  Voleur de femmes

Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Edmond About, Willy Rozier
Stars: Lucile Saint-Simon, Claude Rollet, Jean Lefebvre, Alexandre Rignault
Genres: French cinema, Comedy, Colorized

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/dWTlNuJblJ0
